parameters: Hi, \P[1]! Good to see you up and about.
\fi\C[8]Hiram said \P[1] was acting strange. Maybe if I'm nice...
How are you feeling? Do you remember my name?
"Um?" You must have hit your head pretty hard. My name is Rachel,
and don't you go forgetting it again.
\fi\C[8]Let's see. What are some good Bible names for women?
Mary? I'm not get married any time soon! My name is Rachel.
Hmm. I like that name. But, no, my name is Rachel.
Now that you know who I am again, I could use your help with something.
There are some rats that got into the cellar and need to be caught. I just need
you to catch a few of them for me.
Once you've gathered three of them, do you think you could bring them to me?
I would like to try something out.
And make sure you get the big one. You'll know it by its red eyes.
Sure, I can bring them to you.
No, I think I'll let them loose somewhere else.
Sure, I can bring them to you.
Great! I can't wait to try this.
\fi\C[8]It'll serve the dirty monsters right! I still can't believe what they
What do you plan to do with the rats?
Ah, that's my little secret. Just be careful down there.
\fi\C[8]Or don't. If the rats get you, better you than me.
Take this as well. It gets dark down there.
No, I think I'll let them loose somewhere else.
What, you don't trust me? Fine, do what you will. Just let me know when you're
Take this as well. It gets dark down there. And be careful.
\fi\C[8]Or don't. If the rats get you, better you than me.
Did you catch the rats in the cellar yet?
You did! And you even dealt with the red-eyed rat!
You caught the rats, but you didn't see one with red eyes? Go look again.
Haha! Thanks. I would like to start on my experiment as soon as possible.
You still haven't got them yet? Hurry up!
The rats! Right. I'm on it.
Thanks for taking care of the rats!
\fi\C[8]I wonder what I can get you to do next. I'll have to think about that...
If you plan to bother me, then find something to talk about.
I don't have time to listen to a loser.
The food here is always good. Not great, but good.
I think I ate too much. Ugh...
Look at you all walking around. Do you feel better?
I heard you were going into the caves. You should be careful. People go
\fi\C[8]The barrel is empty, but really, I am just surprised they have something like
\fi\C[8]There is some water in here. It doesn't look very clean, but it should be fine.
\fi\C[8]This must be the way to the kitchen.
"Hey, don't look at this! It's none of your business."
Did you take care of that foul creature blocking the bridge?
You must have some kind of power with you!
This is what you wanted the rats for?! You're cooking them!?
What? It's perfectly good meat, isn't it?
I was just telling Elder Eliezer about why I haven't brought in any fresh
Running a farm sounds really interesting. What's the problem?
\fi\C[8]Don't say it's Corrupted, don't say it's Corrupted...\fr\C[0]
For the past few days, I haven't been able to bring any of my crops to the
village. The path that leads here is blocked by wolves that attack anyone
who uses it. I barely made it through with my life. Couldn't bring a cart.
\fi\C[8]They wont have to worry about that much longer. I feel so bad for everyone.
So, you need my help to hunt down the wolves and make the path safe to
Yup. Just follow the Lake and you'll find 'em.
No problem. I'll be back soon.
\fi\*whispers*\fr\ Are you sure \P[1] is the one who should be
\fi\*whispers*\fr\ No, but that's okay, isn't it?
Did you get the road all cleared out?
Yes, the path has been cleared. It should be safe to travel again.
Great job! I'll go get my crops and bring them here, then.
Well, I was hearing good things about you, but one person can't do everything.
Great job! I'll go get my crops and bring them here, then.
Oh, and the blacksmith Abihu came looking for you. He said something about
getting a batch of nails finished.
Well, I was hearing good things about you, but one person can't do everything.
\P[1] since you've been so helpful lately, I thought you might like to talk to
Abner here. He's one of the local farmers you might not have met yet.
Did you clear the path to Abner's farm?
Yes, the path has been cleared. It should be safe to travel again.
You've really helped us out. The village was having major problems
feeding everyone since we couldn't get Abners crops here.
Too difficult of a problem even for you, I see.
You've really helped us out. The village was having major problems
feeding everyone since we couldn't get Abners crops here.
Oh, Abihu wanted to see you. He said something about getting a batch of nails
GabText You found a \i[276]\C[1] Mint Leaf\C[0]!
